author: akarasulu
msg: Modified output module to deal with expiration exceptions when accessing
the client's ouputstream lock object.  Also enhanced performance by using
buffered io streams and a read buffer.

author: akarasulu
msg: Client and session mgt clean up: still refactoring the ClientKey.  It now
will require accessor users in other modules to catch key expiration rather
than relying on the coder to check for expiration on their own accord.

author: akarasulu
msg: Change default target to build sars instead of just compiling the code.

author: akarasulu
msg: Refactored ClientKey class to make the IO lock objects private with
lock object accessor methods.  Also made some methods and variables more

author: akarasulu
msg: Added service for windows and fixed minor typos and made launch of client
on windows not use the DOS window.
